promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic lizard dark-type pokemon holding a galaxy-pattern sword. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptaila, a a chibi cute basic lizard dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Second Bite, Flash Claw. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "dark" or "Cryptaila". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, lizard-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Cryptaila, the Midnight Shadow Pokémon: Dwells in hushed crypts, using Flash Claw to illuminate the gloom. Its Second Bite ability famously double-strikes its foes.
